testsuites.type: Prepositions that are made with three words.
testsuites.author: Golam Mortuza Hossain

sentence.english: You can get pen as well as paper.
sentence.expected_bengali: আপনি কলম ও কাগজ পেতে পারেন।

testsuites.sentence: You can get pen as well as paper.

sentence.english: You can transfer information by means of physical medium.
sentence.expected_bengali: আপনি ভৌত মাধ্যম ব্যবহার করে তথ্য স্থানান্তর করতে পারেন।

testsuites.sentence: You can transfer information by means of physical medium.

sentence.english: I am announcing on behalf of our company.
sentence.expected_bengali: আমি আমাদের কোম্পানির পক্ষ থেকে ঘোষণা করছি।

testsuites.sentence: I am announcing on behalf of our company.
